DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect 3 dos sublingual house dust mite ( HDM ) tablets versus placebo change baseline rhinitis total symptom score allergen chamber challenge 6 month treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety 100IR , 300IR , 500IR Sublingual House Dust Mite ( HDM ) Tablets Allergic Rhinitis Environment Exposure Chamber Model
DOC.criteria: history HDM rhinitis allergy > 1 year sensitize D. pteronyssinus and/or D. farinae RTSS > = 6 least 2 time point allergen challenge session co sensitization allergen HDM FEV1 < 80 % Asthma GINA > 1
